rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A cozy living room filled with furniture and decorations. there is a bookshelf, a couch and a coffee table in the room. A man and a woman are sitting on the couch. There are doors leading to the kitchen and the hallway

items.name: Bookshelf
items.description: A wooden bookshelf filled with books. There is a red book and a blue book on the shelf that catches your eye.

items.name: Red Book
items.description: There are writings in it you can't read and it's filled with pictures of cats

items.name: Blue Book
items.description: This book is filled with pictures of dogs and you can't read the writings in it.

items.name: Coffee Table
items.description: A small coffee table with some items.

items.name: Couch
items.description: A comfy couch with a throw blanket. There are two people sitting on the couch.

persons.name: John
persons.description: A friendly man sitting on the couch.

dialogue.text: Hello! How can I help you?
dialogue.response: I'm looking for a key to the kitchen.

dialogue.text: I have a key to the kitchen. You can have it if you find my blue key.

doors.name: Wooden Door
doors.description: A door leading to the kitchen.

doors.name: Green Door
doors.description: A door leading to the hallway.

rooms.name: Kitchen

persons.name: Sarah

dialogue.text: Hello! How can I help you?
dialogue.response: I'm looking for a key to the bedroom.

dialogue.text: I have a key to the bedroom. You can have it if you find my rusty key.

doors.name: Wooden Door
doors.description: A door leading back to the living room.

items.name: Painting
